merpi_desc: %USER's throat, you probably can't actually see inside it all that well. But the thought of it sure is nice, maybe you could...?

merpi_normal: %USER is for sure trying to use their throat as a portal to the afterlife on %TARGET's %T_PART!!
merpi_flowery: %USER has recited the ancient rituals and mastered the art of being a soul sucking monster.  %TARGET's %T_PART won't last long before %USER pulls their soul out through it!!
%USER slowly presses %TARGET's %T_PART back further and further in their mouth before finally easing them past the throat barrier for a moment!

merpi_normal: %USER gacks softly as %TARGET's %T_PART fills the back of their throat!
merpi_flowery: %USER presses %TARGET's %T_PART deep into the back of their mouth but can't stop themselves from making a loud gacking noise as their throat barrier is teased!

merpi_normal: %USER pushes %TARGET's %T_PART into %THIER throat, massaging it comfortably.
merpi_flowery: %USER takes %TARGET's %T_PART into their throat fully, their necks muscles massaging it comfortably as they do so.

merpi_normal: %USER heaves, %TARGET's %T_PART being pushed to %USER's limit as they drool on the %T_PART
merpi_flowery: %USER heaves before %TARGET's %T_PART even makes it all the way fully into their throat, their mouth generating more saliva in an attempt to help.  The reality is they're making a mess on the %T_PART.

merpi_normal: %USER slurps on %TARGET's %T_PART noisly, drool seeping out of their mouth.
merpi_flowery: %USER pushes %TARGET's %T_PART deeper, growing more and more comfortable with having their throat invaded.  Meanwhile their mouth decided more spit is clearly need to solve this issue, and %TARGET's %T_PART is soaked in drool because of it!

merpi_normal: %USER rolls their eyes into thier head from %TARGET's %T_PART in their throat!
merpi_flowery: %USER suddenly presses %TARGET's %T_PART down their throat hard, the wet suction sound of their throat trying to accomodate the intrustion filling the room as their eyes roll partially into their skull.
merpi_repeat: %USER really is shoving %TARGET's %T_PART down their throat!

merpi_normal: %USER chokes on %TARGET's %T_PART fitfully, eyes rolling into their head!
merpi_flowery: %USER surrenders completely to %TARGET's %T_PART, forcing it down their throat repeatedly.  Like it was made to fit in their wet hole.  Losing themselves in the action as their eyes roll up into their head!
merpi_repeat: %USER chokes on %TARGET's %T_PART as their eyes roll up!

merpi_normal: %USER audibly chokes on %TARGET's %T_PART, pressing their own head down for more!
merpi_flowery: %USER just can't stop themselves from choking noisily on %TARGET's %T_PART, pressing themselves down for more and more of %TARGET's %T_PART!  No matter how much their body resists!
